mapper.select: select pr.proProResultId,pr.examineId,pr.projectId,pj.projectName,pr.ProResultStatus,p.parameterName,pr.adminId,pr.Summary from tbProResult pr,tbProject pj,tbParameter p where pr.ProResultStatus=p.parameterId and pj.projectId=pr.projectId and pr.examineId=#{examineId} and pr.projectId=#{projectId}
